dark and oppressive this game drips atmosphere from the opening moment dropped into the final day without any information you stumble around unknown characters and shocking horrors as war crimes are committed in the name of public order and sanitation then the clock rewinds and the game begins for real  this isnt for everyone its dense and the lack of voice acting may hold it back for some but its surprisingly fun and the intrigue that pervades the story serves as a perfect hook
